sentences.en: And live alone in the bee - loud glade.
sentences.cn: 然后独隐在蜂吟的深处.

sentences.en: He had come length of that broad glade, with the island of timber, out by Dick.
sentences.cn: 他已经到了宽阔的林间空地尽头, 这空地就是狄克曾经指点过的,长着密密丛丛树林的那块空地.

sentences.en: I feel deep sorry and glade for all of them.
sentences.cn: 我感到深切遗憾和林间空地的全部.

sentences.en: I would speak with your companions who are in glade at Rocca Bianca.
sentences.cn: ‘我要和你那些在比卡山凹里的同伴讲. ’

sentences.en: In the midst of a glade were several huts.
sentences.cn: 林中的空地中间有几间小木屋.

sentences.en: Nine bean, a hive for the honey bee , And live alone in the bee - loud glade.
sentences.cn: 种上九亩豆子, 养一窝蜜蜂, 在林中独居,听蜂儿大声嗡嗡.

sentences.en: Soon Parsee stopped on the borders of the glade, which was lit up by the torches.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿, 向导到了一块空地的边缘上停了下来.那边的广场被几把树脂火炬照得通明.

sentences.en: The family had their lunch in the glade.
sentences.cn: 全家在林中的空地上吃了午饭.

sentences.en: The moving grass, the Indian in his glade.
sentences.cn: 草丛微动, 他的林地里散发着印第安人气味.

sentences.en: The third day of the Dai brothers and sisters are glade to loss the game.
sentences.cn: 第三天,傣族的哥哥姐姐们都到林间空地做丢包游戏.

sentences.en: The tourists are sitting on a sylvan glade.
sentences.cn: 游客们坐在森林中的一块空地上.

sentences.en: The traveler found a glade in the forest.
sentences.cn: 旅行者在森林中找到了一块空地.

sentences.en: The traveler sit on a glade in the forest.
sentences.cn: 旅行者坐在森林中一块空地上.

trans.tran_en: a small open space in a wood or forest
